job_tasks.phrase: Architect and develop AI-driven solutions, focusing on practical, real-world applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of building and designing solutions, specifically those that are AI-driven and have practical applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Rebuild prototypes and extend them to deliver impactful use cases
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and enhancement of existing software components (prototypes) to create functional applications or features.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, evaluate, and refine LLM outputs using state-of-the-art metrics
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of working with and improving the performance of LLMs, which falls under model development and refinement.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and optimize outcomes for precision and reliability
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software engineering practice of ensuring the quality, performance, and stability of the developed solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Present and demo AI solutions to stakeholders, showcasing innovation and functionality.
job_tasks.justification: This involves communicating the value and functionality of the developed AI solutions to business stakeholders, demonstrating an understanding of how the technology serves business needs.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams during Scrum events to ensure smooth execution
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with teams and participation in agile ceremonies (Scrum events), which are key aspects of communication and teamwork.

soft_skills.phrase: Present and demo AI solutions to stakeholders, showcasing innovation and functionality.
soft_skills.justification: Presenting and demonstrating solutions to stakeholders requires strong communication skills to convey technical information effectively to a non-technical audience.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly outlines a balanced mix of core software engineering tasks (architecting, developing, rebuilding prototypes, testing, optimizing) and specific GenAI tasks (designing, evaluating, and refining LLM outputs). The focus is on building AI-driven solutions and working with LLMs, fitting the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, explicitly mentioning LLM outputs and AI-driven solutions. The tasks align well with the defined profiles, making the classification straightforward.
